titles.title: Commission on the Comprehensive Study of Voting Procedures Act of 2000
To establish a Commission for the comprehensive study of voting procedures in Federal, State, and local elections, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on House Administration, and in addition to the Committee on the Judiciary, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

bill.summary: 12/15/2000--Introduced. Commission on the Comprehensive Study of Voting Procedures Act of 2000 - Establishes the Commission on the Comprehensive Study of Voting Procedures to study and report to the President and Congress on all issues relating to voting procedures in Federal, State, and local elections. Authorizes appropriations.
